working 100%. i was playing for the last 6 hours since i installed it. had to install steam files, but do not need to make an account or key. works smooth with no cracks or no audio problems. it updated my video card and directx and all. THIS DEFINITELY WORKS FOR SURE.

If you're having audio problems just switch to Stereo. For some reason this game has problems with surround sound setups. For me I had to go to the Realtek HD Audio Manager and change speaker configuration from quadraphonic to stereo. The audio problems are not this torrents fault, it seems like a random problem with Absolution. Thanks for the upload azaq318.

It works. If you have "DirectX11 failed problem" update Windows 7 (search "important updates") but DO NOT INSTALL THESE TWO UPDATES KB971033 (it checks your copy of windows to see if it's legit) and KB890830 (Windows Malicious Software Removal Tool). Also it seems that you need Steam installed to run the game. 
My specs:Win 7 ultimate x64,  Nvidia GTX460 o.c edition MSI (drivers  306.97), AMD Phenom II X4 965, 4GB RAm. In my opinion this game is poorly optimized, it looks like a console port. THanks!
